LanguageData.PlantDandelion.label: Μαργαρίτες
LanguageData.PlantDandelion.description: Ένα συνηθισμένο λουλουδάκι. Αν και θεωρείται συχνά χωρταρικό, είναι ευχάριστο να το κοιτάς.
LanguageData.PlantAstragalus.label: astragalus
LanguageData.PlantAstragalus.description: A small perennial wildflower that grows in alpine climates.
LanguageData.PlantMoss.label: moss
LanguageData.PlantMoss.description: A wild moss that grows in clumps in areas of low light and high humidity. Very hardy and frost-resistant.
LanguageData.PlantRaspberry.label: Βατομουριά
LanguageData.PlantRaspberry.description: Θαμνόδες φυτό με υπέροχα κόκκινα μούρα.
LanguageData.PlantTreeOak.label: Βελανιδιά
LanguageData.PlantTreePoplar.label: poplar tree
LanguageData.PlantTreePoplar.description: A softwood tree. Grows fast, but yields little useful wood.
LanguageData.PlantTreePine.label: pine tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeBirch.label: birch tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeBirch.description: A northern tree known for its thin, paper-like bark.
